summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 CHRYSLER TOWN AND COUNTRY. WHILE DRIVING, THE HEADLIGHTS FAILED WITHOUT WARNING. THE CONTACT NOTIFIED THE DEALER (GULF CHRYSLER, (251) 662-9586), BUT THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE AND ADVISED THE CONTACT TO CALL NHTSA. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 131,000.
